author: G Seetharaman
title: How countries are using technology to fight coronavirus - Economic Times
description: Asian countries have used a range of technologies in their fight against the pandemic, raising questions about excessive surveillance.  Now, India is also set to launch an app that will tell users if they came in contact with someone who later tested positive…
content:
The rapid spread of Covid-19 has forced countries to use every trick in the book to contain the disease. Some countries, like South Korea and Singapore, have done a better job than, say, Italy and Spain.
Asian countries have used a range of technologies in t… [+3474 chars]
